name: ligatures-limited
description: Only display ligatures in a limited context, such as operators, but not within strings.
author: Kerry Shetline

ligaturesLimited.compactScopeDisplay.description: Display scope info when hovering over text in compact form.

ligaturesLimited.contexts.markDownDescription: List of contexts (token category or token scope) in which ligatures should be enabled.

ligaturesLimited.debug.description: Highlight disabled and enabled ligatures (works best in dark mode).

enumDescriptions: Ligatures are not disabled relative to the cursor position or current selection
Ligatures are disabled at the current cursor position
Ligatures are disabled at the current line where the cursor is positioned
Ligatures are disabled within the current selection
ligaturesLimited.selectionMode.description: Option to disable ligatures at the current cursor position, current line, or within the current selection.
